original_text: The prince shall enter by the vestibule of the gate from outside, and shall take his stand by the post of the gate. The priests shall offer his burnt offering and his peace offerings, and he shall worship at the threshold of the gate. Then he shall go out, but the gate shall not be shut until evening.
korean_text: 군주는 바깥 문 현관을 통하여 들어와서 문 벽 곁에 서고 제사장은 그를 위하여 번제와 감사제를 드릴 것이요 군주는 문 통로에서 예배한 후에 밖으로 나가고 그 문은 저녁까지 닫지 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: The prince shall enter by the vestibule of the gate from outside
sentences.korean_translation: 왕자는 바깥에서 문의 현관으로 들어올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and shall take his stand by the post of the gate
The priests shall offer his burnt offering and his peace offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들은 그의 번제와 화목제를 드릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and he shall worship at the threshold of the gate
but the gate shall not be shut until evening
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 문은 저녁까지 닫히지 않을 것입니다
